content.rendered:
2023 Wrangler NFR Autograph Sessions

Friday, December 8
Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Barrel Racers

• 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
• Golden Nugget — The Grand Event Center Foyer
• Free Admission/Open to the Public
• First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.

Saturday, December 9
Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Tie-Down Ropers

• 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
• MGM Grand — Main Lobby
• Free Admission/Open to the Public
• First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.

Monday, December 11
Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Team Ropers

• 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
• Horseshoe Las Vegas — Guy Fieri’s Flavortown Sports Kitchen
• Free Admission/Open to the Public
• First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.

Tuesday, December 12
Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Steer Wrestlers

• 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
• The D — Bar Canada
• Free Admission/Open to the Public
• First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.

Wednesday, December 13
Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Bull Riders

• 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
• Treasure Island — Gilley’s
• Free Admission/Open to the Public
• First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.

Thursday, December 14
Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Bareback Riders

• 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
• Beerhaus at New York — New York
• Free Admission/Open to the Public
• First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.

Friday, December 15
Wrangler NFR Autograph Session — Saddle Bronc Riders

• 11 a.m. — 1 p.m.
• Resorts World — Wrangler Dawg House
• Free Admission/Open to the Public
• First come/first served; contestants depart at 1 p.m.+

Source: nfrexperience.com
